description:
An unexpected guest drops by with a request that complicates Mei`s Ponskagram scheme.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: I Wonder Where You`ll Be When I Eventually Look Back on This Hell / How to Deal with Being Bored as Hell
Kono Jigoku o Itsuka Boku ga Omoidasu Toki, Kimi wa Doko ni Iru no Darouka. / Hima Sugi Jigoku no Sugoshi Kata
この地獄をいつかボクが思い出す時, キミはどこにいるのだろうか. / ヒマすぎ地獄の過ごし方
